languages.text: "Удивительно. Сильный, тупой и уродливый — первый раз вижу, чтобы гемункулу не надо было дорабатывать материал для развалины".
"Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."
languages.original_text: "Удивительно. Сильный, тупой и уродливый — первый раз вижу, чтобы гемункулу не надо было дорабатывать материал для развалины".

traits.locale_text: "Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."
"Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."
"Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."
"Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."
"Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."

languages.text: 「すげぇな。強くて、愚かで、醜い。まさにラックに仕立てるには理想的な素材だ。ハモンキュラスが手を煩わせるまでもねぇ」
languages.original_text: "Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: 「すげぇな。強くて、愚かで、醜い。まさにラックに仕立てるには理想的な素材だ。ハモンキュラスが手を煩わせるまでもねぇ」

languages.text: "Unglaublich. Stark, dumm und hässlich. Ihr seid das perfekte Rohmaterial für einen Folterer. Ein Haemonculus müsste kaum einen Finger heben."
languages.original_text: "Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: "Unglaublich. Stark, dumm und hässlich. Ihr seid das perfekte Rohmaterial für einen Folterer. Ein Haemonculus müsste kaum einen Finger heben."

languages.text: « Incroyable. Force, stupidité et laideur : vous avez tout ce qu'il faut pour faire une parfaite gorgone. Un hémoncule aurait à peine à lever le petit doigt. »
languages.original_text: "Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: « Incroyable. Force, stupidité et laideur : vous avez tout ce qu'il faut pour faire une parfaite gorgone. Un hémoncule aurait à peine à lever le petit doigt. »

languages.text: «Increíble. Fuerte, estúpido y feo; la materia prima ideal para crear un atormentado. Un hemónculo apenas tendría que mover un dedo contigo».
languages.original_text: "Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: «Increíble. Fuerte, estúpido y feo; la materia prima ideal para crear un atormentado. Un hemónculo apenas tendría que mover un dedo contigo».

languages.text: “噢，多棒啊！你这么强壮、这么愚蠢、这么丑陋，真是太适合做成凌虐者了，甚至连血伶人的改造手术都可以省了。”
languages.original_text: "Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: “噢，多棒啊！你这么强壮、这么愚蠢、这么丑陋，真是太适合做成凌虐者了，甚至连血伶人的改造手术都可以省了。”

languages.text: "İnanılmaz. Aptal, çirkin bir izbandut... Harap olmak için biçilmiş kaftansın. Haimonkulus olsa parmağını bile kaldırmaya tenezzül etmez."
languages.original_text: "Incredible. Strong, stupid, and ugly — you are the perfect raw material for a Wrack. A Haemonculus would scarcely have to lift a finger."
